item.title: Added Singlebase.cloud in the BaaS section
item.description: https://singlebase.cloud - SinglebaseCloud is an AI-powered all-in-one backend platform to accelerate app development. It offers tools like Vector DB, Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, and Storage, aiming to simplify backend development. Free/Starter Plan offers Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, Storage.

item.title: remove templated.io
item.description: https://www.usefindr.com/ - Universal search that lets you search all your apps, at once. Search assistant that lets you answer questions using your information. Free plan offers unlimited unified search and 5 co daily co pilot queries.

item.title: Add NotificationAPI to Messaging
item.description: https://www.notificationapi.com/ - Add user notifications to any software in 5 minutes. The free plan includes 10,000 notifications/month + 100 SMS and Automated Calls.

item.title: added nappy.co for stock photos list
item.description: https://nappy.co/ - Beautiful photos of Black and Brown people, for free. For commercial and personal use.

item.title: Add AndroidIDE in IDE and Code Editing
item.description: https://m.androidide.com/ - An Open Source IDE to develop real, Gradle-based Android applications on Android devices.

item.title: Added octomind to testing
item.description: https://www.octomind.dev/ - Auto-generated, run and maintained Playwright UI tests with AI-assisted test case generation

item.title: Add MConverter
item.description: https://mconverter.eu/convert/to/avif/ - Convert files in bulk. Supports many file formats, including new ones like [AVIF](https://mconverter.eu/convert/to/avif/). Extract all image frames from videos. Free for up to ten 100MB-files per day, processed in batches of two.
